mapper.select: select base_dt , cur_unit , ttb, tts, deal_bas_r, cur_nm from exchange where cur_unit = #{curUnit} and base_dt between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
mapper.insert: insert into exchange ( cur_unit, base_dt, ttb, tts, deal_bas_r, cur_nm) values (#{curUnit},#{baseDt}, #{ttb}, #{tts}, #{dealBasR}, #{curNm}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ttb = #{ttb}, tts = #{tts}, deal_bas_r = #{dealBasR}, cur_nm = #{curNm}

INSERT INTO exchange (cur_unit, base_dt, ttb, tts, deal_bas_r,cur_nm) VALUES
(#{item.curUnit}, #{item.baseDt}, #{item.ttb}, #{item.tts}, #{item.dealBasR}, #{curNm})
